textBeforeTable: CLIPPERS 2011-12 PRESEASON SCHEDULE Los Angeles Clippers season tickets for the 2011-12 campaign are available now on Clippers.com or by calling (213) 742-7555. The Clippers complete their 2011 preseason schedule with two neutral site road games against the Lakers. On October 25th, the Clippers travel to the Valley View Casino Center in San Diego, CA to take on the Lakers. They follow that up with an October 27th contest against the Lakers at Rabobank Arena in Bakersfield, CA. Los Angeles opens the preseason on the road in Phoenix, with a match-up against the Suns on October 11th at US Airways Center. The Clippers also travel to Utah for an October 14th game against the Jazz and to Sacramento for an October 22nd game against the Kings. The Clippers play three of their eight preseason games at STAPLES Center, with home games against the Atlanta Hawks on October 13th, the Utah Jazz on October 17th and the Golden State Warriors on October 21st. The Clippers have announced their eight-game 2011 preseason schedule. CLIPPERS ANNOUNCE 2011-12 PRESEASON SCHEDULE For Immediate Release
textAfterTable: All Times Pacific Thank You Season Tickets NBATickets.com
